column1: Thereafter,  the  Public  Service  Commission  submitted  its  observations
dated 19.04.2016, marked X2, to the Administrative Appeals Tribunal. In
its  observations  the  Public  Service  Commission  has  stated  that  the
Petitioner could be promoted to Executive Grade Il of the said Service with
contended that in computing the satisfactory service two years should be
deducted  for  the  deferment  of  two  salary  increments,  and  therefore  the
Petitioner could not be promoted to Executive Grade II of the said service
